page.title: 06LIFE STYLES, LYNEMOUTH.
page.content: {School. cont'd.} games such as rounders, hockey,tennis and football. We play until 2.3O. When we come back into the classroom we have a story and complete any unfinished work. At 3.lO. the bell goes we put up our chairs, say our prayers and go home. {Evening. At 6.O'clock my Dad comes home and we have tea such as salad and yogurt. Then I go out to play with my friends. We play 'hit and run' or 'kerby' or go to the Welfare. At 8.O'clock I go home and watch television for an hour. At 9.O'clock I put my nighty on and I read until 9.3O. then I go to bed.
